children.name: Data Volume Tiers - Partition Ingestion and Credits
children.title: Data Volume Tiers - Partition Ingestion and Credits

panels.title: Tabular View - Partitions Ingest and Credits

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory=view_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}")
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
//| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
| value as partition
| sum(count) as events,sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, partition

| bytes /1024/1024/1024 as gb | sort gb

// remove long categories
| sum(events) as events,sum(gb) as gbytes by partition,dataTier
| total gbytes as tgb 
| total gbytes as tgbs by partition
| tgbs / tgb as fraction


| fraction * 100 as percent
//| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
| if (datatier="frequent",gbytes * 9,gbytes * 20) as credits
| if (datatier="infrequent",gbytes * .4,credits) as credits
|sum(credits) as credits, sum(events) as events,sum(gbytes) as gbytes, sum(percent) as percent by datatier,partition
| sort percent

(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory=view_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}" )
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value
| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
| sum(gb) as gb by datatier

panels.title: Ingest GB By Tier Over Time

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory=view_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}")
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
//| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value
| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value,_timeslice
| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb

| sum(gb) as gb by datatier,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column datatier

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard uses the new data volume with tier index for example: ```_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=view_and_tier_volume```.

It shows ingestion gb, events and estimated ingest credits by partition, tier.

Available filters are:
- timeslice: timeslice value for some graphs such as 1m 15m 1h
- value_filter: apply a where matches filter to value names
- tier_filter: use * or choose a single tier

panels.title: Credits For Paritions Over Time
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"labelFontSize":10},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":10,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":10,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":12,"maxHeight":50,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"series":{},"general":{"type":"column","displayType":"stacked","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory=view_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}")
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
//| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value
| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value,_timeslice
| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
| if (datatier="frequent",gb * 9,gb * 20) as credits
| if (datatier="infrequent",gb * .4,credits) as credits
| if(value matches "*sumologic*","sumo_internal",value) as value
| sum(credits) as credits by value,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column value

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=*_and_tier_volume | parse field=_sourcecategory "*_and_tier_volume" as view
| count by view

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory={{view}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}")
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
//| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
| sum(count) as events,sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value,_sourcecategory
//| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value,_timeslice
| bytes /1024/1024/1024 as gb | sort gb
| parse field=_sourcecategory "*_and_tier_volume" as dimension 
| fields -_sourcecategory,_some_matched,bytes

// remove long categories
| if (length(value) > 50,concat(substring(value,0,50),"..."),value) as value 
| sum(events) as events,sum(gb) as gbytes by dimension,value,dataTier
| total gbytes as tgb 
| total gbytes as tgbs by value
| tgbs / tgb as fraction

// *** THIS LINE rolls up small sources into 'other' ***
| if(( fraction * 100 )> {{other_pct}},value,"other" ) as value
| fraction * 100 as percent
//| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
| if (datatier="frequent",gbytes * 9,gbytes * 20) as credits
| if (datatier="infrequent",gbytes * .4,credits) as credits
|sum(credits) as credits,count as rows, sum(events) as events,sum(gbytes) as gbytes, sum(percent) as percent by datatier,dimension,value
| sort percent

panels.title: Ingest Over Time - Top Sources Other < {{other_pct}} %
panels.visualSettings: {"title":{"fontSize":14},"axes":{"axisX":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"labelFontSize":10},"axisY":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"gridThickness":1,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":10,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"B","isCustom":false},"gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal","minimum":0},"axisY2":{"title":"","titleFontSize":10,"titleFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Medium, \"Arial Bold\", sans-serif","titleFontColor":"#6D8DA6","titleFontWeight":"normal","labelFontColor":"#6D8DA6","lineColor":"#DDE4E9","stripLines":null,"lineThickness":0,"labelFontSize":10,"tickColor":"#E6EAED","logarithmic":false,"linear":false,"unit":{"value":"GB","isCustom":false},"gridThickness":0,"valueFormatString":"","gridColor":"#E6EAED","labelFontFamily":"Lab Grotesque Regular, \"Arial\", sans-serif","labelFontWeight":"normal"}},"legend":{"enabled":true,"verticalAlign":"bottom","fontSize":12,"maxHeight":50,"showAsTable":false,"wrap":true},"series":{},"general":{"type":"column","displayType":"stacked","fillOpacity":1,"mode":"timeSeries"},"color":{"family":"Categorical Default"},"xy":{"xDimension":[],"yDimension":[],"zDimension":[]},"overrides":[]}

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory={{view}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}")
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
| sizeInBytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
// remove long categories
| if (length(value) > 50,concat(substring(value,0,50),"..."),value) as value 
| sum(events) as events,sum(gb) as gbytes by view,value,_timeslice
| total gbytes as tgb 
| total gbytes as tgbs by value
| tgbs / tgb as fraction

// *** THIS LINE rolls up small sources into 'other' ***
| if(( fraction * 100 )> {{other_pct}},value,"other" ) as value
| fraction * 100 as percent
//|count as rows, sum(events) as events,sum(gbytes) as gbytes, sum(percent) as percent by view,value
//| sort percent

| sum(gbytes) as gb by _timeslice,value 
| transpose row _timeslice column value

| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}" )
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value
| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
| sum(gb) as gb by datatier

queries.queryString:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory={{view}}_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<value>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| where tolowercase(value) matches tolowercase("{{value_filter}}")
| where datatier matches "{{tier_filter}}"
| timeslice by {{timeslice}}
//| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value
| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes by datatier, value,_timeslice
| bytes / 1024/1024/1024 as gb
| if (datatier="frequent",gb * 9,gb * 20) as credits
| if (datatier="infrequent",gb * .4,credits) as credits
| sum(credits) as credits by datatier,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column datatier

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard uses the new data volume with tier index for example: ```_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_and_tier_volume```.

It shows ingestion gb, events and estimated ingest credits by category, tier and so on.

Available filters are:
- view: such as sourcecategory,view,collector,sourcehost. There is a volume for each sumo metadata.
- timeslice: timeslice value for some graphs such as 1m 15m 1h
- other_pct: Some panels group any category under this % threshold as 'other'. For example to see categories less than 1% of total GB as 'other' use 1. To see all categories use 0.
- value_filter: apply a where matches filter to value names
- tier_filter: use * or choose a single tier

sourceDefinition.query:
_index=sumologic_volume _sourcecategory=*_and_tier_volume | parse field=_sourcecategory "*_and_tier_volume" as view
| count by view

search.queryText:
(_index=sumologic_volume) _sourcecategory=sourcecategory_and_tier_volume
| parse regex "\{\"field\":\"(?<field>[^\"]+)\",\"dataTier\":\"(?<dataTier>[^\"]+)\",\"sizeInBytes\":(?<sizeInBytes>[^\"]+),\"count\":(?<count>[^\"]+)\}," multi
| sum(sizeinbytes) as bytes, sum(count) as events by field,datatier,_sourcecategory
| bytes /1024/1024/1024 as gb | sort gb
| parse field=_sourcecategory "*_and_tier_volume" as dimension | fields -_sourcecategory,_some_matched
